news.title: Final AMG Star Wars: Armada Update
news.body: Release includes revised tournamen regulations, updated rules, and errata.

news.title: ARC Open Beta Tournament
news.body: Lists can be built for this tournament by changing the list version to 'ARC Open Beta Tournament'.

news.title: User Accounts Rolled Out
news.body: User accounts are available to use. This is an unstable feature and is likely to still have bugs. Please direct bugs to the contacts found in the 'Contact Us' button
